protein.specific_function: May initiate a process leading to the deglycation of fructoselysine and of glycated proteins. May play a role in the phosphorylation of 1-deoxy-1-morpholinofructose (DMF), fructoselysine, fructoseglycine, fructose and glycated lysozyme

reference.reference_text: Delpierre G, Rider MH, Collard F, Stroobant V, Vanstapel F, Santos H, Van Schaftingen E: Identification, cloning, and heterologous expression of a mammalian fructosamine-3-kinase. Diabetes. 2000 Oct;49(10):1627-34.
